thread.title: This Cute Story About Blind Dates Will Change The Way You Think About Love
thread.title_full: This Cute Story About Blind Dates Will Change The Way You Think About Love

title: This Cute Story About Blind Dates Will Change The Way You Think About Love
text:
facebook 242 SHARES 
We girls love to dream of a fairytale love story for ourselves. We want to believe that we will bump into the love of our lives one day and we will have our happily ever after. Now imagine that story coming true. That's what this short film by Ultra Shorts, Half Ticket, is all about. This film will make you believe in taking chances when it comes to love because you'll never know where can you find the person of your dreams, just like the person in this short movie. 
Little did these two know that love was lurking around the corner for them when they happened to get a half ticket for the Ultra Indian Derby. Watch this beautiful video below to see these two people coming along and how their unique love story blossomed over a blind date. To watch more such shorts, head to the Cheers! Youtube channel.
